channel.title: Keep certrain items on death
channel.description: So i was wondering him i can make it so instead of running back and looting firecape and torso and defenders they just stay in ur inventory on death..

item.title: Keep certrain items on death
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Check your drop item method, it may be a loop through the inventory dropping each item and removing it from your inventory, perhaps run the ids through an array to see if they are droppable. Or you can set a new parameter on dropped items to make them disappear without showing publicly for others - this would require more knowledge though.

Read full topic
